alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Taylor County through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Perry, moving southwest at 5 mph. At 535PM EDT the Perry-Foley Airport measured a wind gust of 53 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Secotan, Boyd, Cabbage Grove, Econfina, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Fenholloway and Lake Bird. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
